text: Write a short poem about your favorite season.
Describe a fictional planet in 3 sentences.
Invent a new holiday and explain how people celebrate it.
Write a tweet-sized story with a twist ending.
Describe your ideal workspace without naming any furniture.
Write a conversation between a cat and a toaster.
Come up with a new word and define it.
Explain boredom as if you're an alien visiting Earth.
Describe a superhero whose only power is extreme politeness.
